uid.description: The unique identifier of the online profile settings

business_uid.description: The unique identifier of the business

supported_languages.description: List of language codes supported by the business's online profile. Null indicates nothing was selected.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the online profile settings were created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the online profile settings were last updated

description: Defines online profile settings for a business, including supported languages and configuration options.
